mapper.insert: insert into lyj_advertisement (lyj_advertisement_id, lyj_advertisement_name, lyj_advertisement_imageurl, lyj_advertisement_begindatetime, lyj_advertisement_enddatetime, lyj_advertisement_page, lyj_advertisement_pageurl) values (#{lyjAdvertisementId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lyjAdvertisementName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lyjAdvertisementImageurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lyjAdvertisementBegindatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lyjAdvertisementEnddatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lyjAdvertisementPage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lyjAdvertisementPageurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update lyj_advertisement set lyj_advertisement_name = #{lyjAdvertisementName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lyj_advertisement_imageurl = #{lyjAdvertisementImageurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lyj_advertisement_begindatetime = #{lyjAdvertisementBegindatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, lyj_advertisement_enddatetime = #{lyjAdvertisementEnddatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, lyj_advertisement_page = #{lyjAdvertisementPage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lyj_advertisement_pageurl = #{lyjAdvertisementPageurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where lyj_advertisement_id = #{lyjAdvertisementId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select lyj_advertisement_id, lyj_advertisement_name, lyj_advertisement_imageurl, lyj_advertisement_begindatetime, lyj_advertisement_enddatetime, lyj_advertisement_page, lyj_advertisement_pageurl from lyj_advertisement where lyj_advertisement_id = #{lyjAdvertisementId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select lyj_advertisement_id, lyj_advertisement_name, lyj_advertisement_imageurl, lyj_advertisement_begindatetime, lyj_advertisement_enddatetime, lyj_advertisement_page, lyj_advertisement_pageurl from lyj_advertisement

select count(1) from lyj_advertisement where 1=1
and lyj_advertisement_page=#{pageName}
